isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - REMOVE - CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

svcproc.title: CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models

step1.para:
Remove passenger bucket seat, fixed passenger seat, two man fixed bench seat without tool box or two man fixed bench seat with tool box, refer to
SEATS
. For removing passenger bucket seat, refer to Remove Passenger Bucket Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For removing fixed passenger seat, refer to Remove Fixed Passenger Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For removing two man fixed bench seat without tool box, refer to Remove Two Man Fixed Bench Seat without Tool Box on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For removing two man fixed bench seat with tool box, refer to Remove Two Man Fixed Bench Seat with Tool Box on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Remove passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 102 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove torx head bolt (Item 1) securing shoulder belt (Item 2) to the cab, passenger side shown. Lay the torx head bolt and shoulder belt out of the way on the cab floor and save for installation.
Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 3), remove seven push-in fasteners (Item 4), passenger side shown. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Remove passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) from the cab. Lay it out of the way and save for installation unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 102. Passenger Side Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Standard Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. PASSENGER SIDE CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove driver side corner and side interior trim panel on standard cab.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models

step1.para:
If so equipped, remove full width rear bench seat. Refer to
SEATS
. For removing full width rear bench seat, refer to Remove Full Width Rear Bench Seat on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

If so equipped, remove bunk/storage unit from behind front seats, refer to
EXTENDED CAB BUNK/STORAGE UNIT
. For removing bunk/storage unit, refer to Remove Bunk/Storage Unit on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models.

Remove passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 103 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove torx head bolt (Item 1) securing shoulder belt (Item 2) to the cab, passenger side shown. Lay the torx head bolt and shoulder belt out of the way on the cab floor and save for installation.
Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 3), remove nine push-in fasteners (Item 4), passenger side shown. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Remove passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) from the cab. Lay it out of the way and save for installation unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 103. Passenger Side Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Extended Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. PASSENGER SIDE CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove driver side corner and side interior trim panel on extended cab.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models

step1.para:
Remove full width rear bench seat, refer to
SEATS
. For removing full width rear bench seat, refer to Remove Full Width Rear Bench Seat on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Remove passenger side rear cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 104 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove torx head bolt (Item 1) securing shoulder belt (Item 2) to the cab, passenger side shown. Lay the torx head bolt and shoulder belt out of the way on the cab floor and save for installation.
Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 3), remove seven push-in fasteners (Item 4), passenger side shown. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Remove passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) from the cab. Lay it out of the way and save for installation unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 104. Passenger Side Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Crew Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. PASSENGER SIDE CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove driver side corner and side interior trim panel on crew cab.
